data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during AMPHITRITE cruise from St. Kitts to Spithead started at 1801-06-21
Ship: Amphitrite (6th Rate Frigate), Voyage: St Kitts - Spithead, 1st Observer: John Harvey (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 28G 593BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
